current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To promote the development of local strategies to
		  coordinate use of assistance under sections 8 and 9 of the United States
		  Housing Act of 1937 with public and private resources, to enable eligible
		  families to achieve economic independence and self-sufficiency, and for other
		  purposes.
